content:
I'd be happy to help you with that. Here are some upcoming holidays and observances for the next week:

**This Week:**

* Monday, March 20: International Day of Happiness, World Day of Theatre for Children and Young People, Nowruz (Persian New Year)
* Tuesday, March 21: World Down Syndrome Day, International Day of Forests
* Wednesday, March 22: World Water Day
* Thursday, March 23: National Puppy Day (US)
* Friday, March 24: World Tuberculosis Day
* Saturday, March 25: International Day of Remembrance of the Victims of Slavery and the Transatlantic Slave Trade
* Sunday, March 26: Mother's Day (UK and some European countries)

**Next Week:**

* Monday, March 27: World Theatre Day
* Tuesday, March 28: Palm Tuesday (Christianity)
* Wednesday, March 29: Maundy Thursday (Christianity)
* Thursday, March 30: Good Friday (Christianity)
* Friday, March 31: Cesar Chavez Day (US), Transfer Day (US Virgin Islands)

**Other Observances:**

* March is also recognized as:
	+ National Nutrition Month (US)
	+ Women's History Month (US)
	+ National Reading Month (US)
	+ National Kidney Month (US)

Please note that these are not exhaustive lists, and there may be other observances and holidays specific to your location, culture, or community.
